title: Permanently Suspended Account but I've never played
body:
The fall quarter of my university had just started, it was the 25th of September. I remember it being a rather sunny day. On this lazy Sunday morning,   I created a league of legends account. One of my friends had asked me to because they were going to start playing it again. I remember getting a "Welcome to League of Legends" e-mail and everything. I logged in once when I downloaded the game that afternoon, and then immediately closed the game, it was going to be something I would do on my free time, not when I had many assignments to get started on for the upcoming week. 

Upon much convincing, I decided to finally try this game out today, December 5th. I figured I might as well update to the beta client so I don't get used to an older one, only for it to change. I tried logging in once it was finished, and it said my account was permanently suspended. 

"Maybe it's a glitch," I thought, as I was noticing something about transfering accounts over. I tried again, same thing. 

It was at that moment I had decided to try logging in on the older launcher/client, the one I could log into before. I redownloaded it, and tried to log in again. 

Your account has been permanently suspended, check your e-mail for details. My e-mail associated with the account has a "Welcome to League of Legends" e-mail and a "Verify your e-mail address" e-mail. 

How peculiar.

replies.body:
Ouch, that's certainly not the welcome that you were looking for! D:

We can take a look at what happened and work with you on this if you reach out in a [**support ticket.**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) One of our account specialists will get back in touch with you to start the process.

Let me know if you have any questions.
